quoteText: iv) We only reveal Personal Information to unaffiliated third parties if: (1) you request or authorize it. (2) the information is provided to help complete a transaction for you. (3) the information is provided to comply with the law, applicable regulations, court orders or subpoenas, to enforce our Terms of Use or other agreements, or to protect our rights, property or safety or the rights, property or safety of our users or others (e.g., to a consumer reporting agency for fraud protection etc.).
title: The service will not allow third parties to access your personal information without a legal basis

tosdr.case: The service will not allow third parties to access your personal information without a legal basis
